DocumentCopy_event.summary: The copy event fires when the user initiates a copy action through the browser's user interface.

remarks.para: The original target for this event is the that was the intended target of the copy action. You can listen for this event on the interface to handle it in the capture or bubbling phases. For full details on this event please see the page on the Element: copy event.
